text.en: Enter your username. We will send you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.

ok_header.en: Link to reset password has been sent

ok_text.em: We have sent you an email with instructions on how to reset your password. Check your inbox and follow the instructions. After you successfully setup new password, go to the service and log in with the new credentials.

err_text_part1.en: Please check the filled username is correct.

err_text_part2.en: If you have problem with recovering your password, please contact
